Author: Olatunjex
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: DURING BOUNTY CAMPAIGN   This is from your team when we were working  Ingrida Willems DESICO Community Manager  ✅ IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING DESICO KYC FOR BOUNTY PARTICIPANTS.   ✅ BOUNTY ended on November 8th. Please contact @ibgceo regarding count of stakes.   ✅ We ask you to complete KYC and AML procedures AFTER the DESI token sale first round finishes on November 30. We will then be able to allocate more time to you and guide you through KYC if you experience any problems.   ✅ DESICO KYC will be open until token distribution which is set on the beggining of February 2019. KYC/AML procedure will be required in order to claim earned tokens, the same at it was when we were planning to have DESI utility token crowdsale. It was announced in bounty conditions   AFTER BOUNTY CAMPAIGN  Ingrida Willems DESICO Community Manager: Dear participants of DESICO bounty,  As you all know DESICO was aiming to carry out an ICO followed by all its components, including Bounty campaigns. The crypto markets in 2018 clearly showed that ICOs have failed their mission. The ICO process is full of fake identities and scamming. The biggest majority of utility tokens never bring profit to investors after the listing. Companies used ICOs as a fund-raising mechanism, not because their tokenomics needed a utility token. That’s why most of the utility tokens issued are below their initial capitalization.  Anticipating the situation of fake promises in ICO model, DESICO made a decision to switch from ICO to Security token offering (STO). STO is a strictly regulated offering that provides investors with ability to invest in tokenized securities. Investors need to pass KYC and AML procedures along with provision of proof of their identity, residence address as well as indication of their income source. Current regulation across the globe does not provide possibility to issue and/or distribute security tokens if they were not paid for.  DESICO decided to be fair to people who participated in its bounty campaigns by admitting the failure of ICO process. DESI token is a security token. Therefore, DESI security tokens cannot and will be not distributed to bounty participants. We will also not issue and distribute utility tokens that will have no value in the market.  We are grateful to each of you who took part in campaigns and spread  the message about benefits of security tokens. We express our sincere apologies to all participants. We believe that the efforts that all of you and DESICO put into spreading the word will still contribute positively to stabilization of overall crypto market.  DESICO team

Author: StoneCold262
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: I'm sort of confused by your statement. It could be me, but if I understand correctly, your assuming that in 5 years they may buy back your tokens for what you paid? I think that could be the problem. What they are saying is that they reserve the right to buy back the tokens from token holders (only those willing to sell as you own them) at the current value at that time, plus 12.5% per year, plus the 3 year audited revenue. So you could have a token you buy today for 1 Euro that down the road is worth 10.72 Euros each! So more than a 10x increase in value per token. That to me says it is a great investment and a wonderful asset. In no scenario are they saying they will buy them back at today's prices. They just cannot predict the future growth so they do not know exactly what they will be worth. But, they expect the value to increase along with revenue and the 12.5% revenue  sharing. It's similar to a stock buyback from a company, plus they are going to add to its value above and beyond what it is worth that day. You can't lose!

Author: Prolong
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: They state that they will buy back the tokens in no less than 5 years so what is the point to buy those tokens? I don't get it. The porpoise of a token is to use it as a real coin to buy assets. If in the futre they buy back those coins back I will have nothing to buy those assets in the future when the coin could reach it's fll potential in market value. They also reserve the right to not pay dividens if they don't want. something is mainly advertised on their website. 12.5% of any growth for token holders. I invest for my future but if they are going to buy it back then why should I put my money on it? What's the bennefit in having those "SECURITY TOKENS" that are not secure in the first place? They will make a platform to give framework to other ICOS with the same patern. I think it's very clever for them to take the money from the crowd. Make it work until they get an equal or superior margin of money and they just buy back everything and take all the "rights" of the token holders. I'm not making this up\1 It's written on their website in little letters in the "DESICO financial instrument" section at the end of the page of their website.  https://www.desico.io/en  "UAB DESICO may redeem the DESI Tokens: not earlier than 5 years from the date of payment and delivery of the Tokens (on or about November 25th, 2018). In case of redemption, the redemption price is equal to: 3 * last year audited revenue * 12.5% + nominal value of DESI tokens. Example: in 2028 audited annual revenue was 1000m EUR. In 2029 single token buyout price would be 3 * 1000,000,000 * 12.5% / 38,575,472 + 1 = 10.72 EUR DESICO plans to issue similar DESI Token offerings within the next 2 years in order to attract EUR 37,552,454 in public and non-public offerings."  Any explanation could be of help

Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: I have been following Desico for a couple of months now and am continually impressed by their community engagement and transparency, a while back I made a suggestion to lock up all free tokens for a period of time to protect ICO backers (people who are supporting and passionate about the platform). My suggestion was listened to, replied to by a team member and acted upon, thanking me for the input. The decision to delay the ICO could prove masterful and their weekly updates are insightful and impressive. Definitely my favourite under the radar ICO, probably won’t stay this way as Telegram community has skyrocketed to 15,00 users. Shout out to community manager and TG admin Ingrida, she is a breath of fresh air and in IMO a true reflection of where this project is at. Definitely one to watch and one I’ll be filling my bags with. 💰💰💰💰💰

This thing looks like a one stop shop. Something we all need.

Body: 2018 will be remembered as the year of the security token, and DESICO looks to be one of the front runners in making the shift from "faux" utility to compliant, regulated security token offerings affordable and realistic for startups. Full marks for team: experienced professionals with successful startups under their belt and a high calibre advisory board. The product is robust and approved by an EU financial regulator. In terms of vision, while not the first security token exchange project, based on my research, they are one of the teams best placed to execute well and to capture a large share of the EMEA market in the space. This is absolutely one of the top high calibre projects of 2018 and beyond.

Author: fancy2973
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴

From my quick read of the article, it makes sense to get all the licences in order, so that by the time the crowd sale starts, they will have not only the MVP but also the legal requirements will be taken care of. A three month ico sale may seem long, but if the market turns around and all legal things are fulfilled, I can see the tokens selling out pretty fast. All the same, shame that they feel they had to push things back. It will be five months now before this thing is trading. Seems like forever in crypto, but it's nothing in reality.

Author: alexvilis
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: DESICO weekly roundup #11 | Marc P. Bernegger joins DESICO | Shoutout from Suppoman https://medium.com/@desico.io/desico-weekly-roundup-11-marc-p-98942eb3911a  Hello, DESICO community and welcome to the 11th weekly roundup! I hope you’re having a great vacation, and if you’re not, tune to see what we have been doing this week with DESICO.  So, our biggest news this week is that Marc P. Bernegger is joining us as our Investor Relations Advisor. We are super excited! Marc has been acknowledged as one of the top 100 entrepreneurs in Europe by the Telegraph. He has also been acknowledged amongst the top 100 under 40 in his native Switzerland.  Marc’s reputation and experience is a huge boost for DESICO and we are super happy. It will take our project sky high!  On a related note, Ethan Pierse has joined our core team as VP for Investor Relations, and it is also very good news for DESICO and the DESICO community.  Another great news is that crypto influencer Suppoman, one of the top influencers in the crypto world, has mentioned us in one of his videos. He said that security tokens is the thing that will let their holders to become actual shareholders of the companies that issue those tokens. He mentioned us, DESICO, as one of the projects to watch and to follow. If you want to see the full review, head out to our Medium or our Telegram and you will find the link.  And of course, don’t forget that our county campaign round two is live and it’s on! So, head out to our Telegram, head out to our website, head out to the Bitcoin Talk threat about the bounty to participate and earn your DESI tokens. We have 2 million tokens being distributed amongst the community, and we hope that you will get your share.

Author: Kpss_pro
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: Currently, security ICOs are governed by a series of recommendations or “soft-laws”, meaning ICO investors have almost zero protections in comparison to “traditional” securities. Funds lost in an ICO may never be recovered and the tokens from a typical ICO are not backed by any real world assets.

Author: Hedranaikorafna
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: During the last two years, the ICO industry has experienced a surge in popularity as a fundraising method for businesses. In 2017, startup companies raised $6,5bn through ICOs as way of financing their business endeavour. However, as the ICO industry continues to develop, further regulations are required to distinguish between a security token and a utility token. Companies wishing to fundraise their startup capital issue two types of token to investors — security tokens, and utility tokens.

Author: computerizedfish
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: During the second quarter of 2018, regulations around ICOs are set to tighten, with Google, Twitter, and YouTube scheduled to completely ban all ICO advertisements during this period. Yet despite the regulatory noose tightening around the neck of ICOs, former Swedbank senior advisor and DESICO co-founder, Audrius Griškevičius, believes the stronger regulations surrounding security ICOs will benefit the ICO industry as a whole.

Author: sahabond
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: DESICO is the world’s first platform to issue, buy, and sell security tokens in full compliance with the law. Its ecosystem will disrupt the global $155 billion venture capital market by introducing security tokens through blockchain.   The DESICO ecosystem will include a regulated crowdfunding platform to issue security tokens and an exchange that will provide liquidity to security tokens issued via DESICO from day one. DESICO will also have a payment system based on the European e-money license. This means that it will able to provide ICOs with IBAN accounts from the very first day they become listed on the DESICO platform. Author: uniquelymoi
Title: 🔴[ANN] DESICO - The world's first platform to issue and trade security tokens🔴
Body: I'm excited for what Desico aims to achieve. The built-in exchange is such a good idea too, providing that liquidity straight away. All too many times, people have been burned by investing in ICO's but then see that the token not be listed for months on end. I must admit, I agree that it all looks very complicated as mentioned earlier in the thread, but the explanatory videos are very helpful. And more and more reviews/articles are popping up every day. I look forward to following this project closely.
